message:
SYSTEM: NeOn-Overview-v1.pdf: Página 5
5
<<Texto libre: proyecto, speaker, etc.>>
Key concrete contributions
• System-level contributions
• an open, scalable, service-centred reference architecture for the
lifecycle of networked ontologies, meta-data and contexts
• the NeOn toolkit for system development with networked
ontologies
• Based on OntoStudio
• the NeOn methodology for system development with networked
ontologies
• Contributions to foundational research
• methods and tools for managing dynamic, evolving, possibly
inconsistent and contextually grounded networked ontologies
• methods and tools for supporting large-scale collaborative
development, taking into account consensus, communal trust
and group context
• three truly innovative testbeds in two sectors
speaker: SYSTEM
